mapper.select: SELECT a.PADEP, a.PADEP_NUM, a.ORG_CD, b.DIV_NM, a.EMP_BONUS1, a.EMP_BONUS2, a.EMP_BONUS3, a.EMP_BONUS4, a.EMP_BONUS5, a.EMP_BONUS6, a.EMP_BONUS7, a.EMP_BONUS8 FROM ( SELECT SUM(EMP_BONUS1) AS EMP_BONUS1, SUM(EMP_BONUS2) AS EMP_BONUS2, SUM(EMP_BONUS3) AS EMP_BONUS3, SUM(EMP_BONUS4) AS EMP_BONUS4, SUM(EMP_BONUS5) AS EMP_BONUS5, SUM(EMP_BONUS6) AS EMP_BONUS6, SUM(EMP_BONUS7) AS EMP_BONUS7, SUM(EMP_BONUS8) AS EMP_BONUS8, ORG_CD, '장려금지급률' AS PADEP , '01' AS PADEP_NUM FROM ( SELECT ORG_CD, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 7 THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS1, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 6 THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS2, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 5 THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS3, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 4 THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS4, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 3 THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS5, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 2 THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS6, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 1 THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS7, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} THEN EMP_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS8 FROM ( SELECT EVAL_YEAR, ORG_CD, EMP_BONUS, CHIEF_BONUS, EVAL_RANK FROM TG_EVALORG WHERE EVAL_YEAR > #{year} - 8 ) a ORDER BY EVAL_YEAR,ORG_CD ) GROUP BY ORG_CD UNION ALL SELECT SUM(EMP_BONUS1) AS EMP_BONUS1, SUM(EMP_BONUS2) AS EMP_BONUS2, SUM(EMP_BONUS3) AS EMP_BONUS3, SUM(EMP_BONUS4) AS EMP_BONUS4, SUM(EMP_BONUS5) AS EMP_BONUS5, SUM(EMP_BONUS6) AS EMP_BONUS6, SUM(EMP_BONUS7) AS EMP_BONUS7, SUM(EMP_BONUS8) AS EMP_BONUS8, ORG_CD, '사장성과지급률' AS PADEP, '02' AS PADEP_NUM FROM ( SELECT ORG_CD, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 7 THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS1, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 6 THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS2, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 5 THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS3, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 4 THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS4, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 3 THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS5, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 2 THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS6, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} - 1 THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS7, CASE WHEN EVAL_YEAR = #{year} THEN CHIEF_BONUS END AS EMP_BONUS8 FROM ( SELECT EVAL_YEAR, ORG_CD, EMP_BONUS, CHIEF_BONUS, EVAL_RANK FROM TG_EVALORG WHERE EVAL_YEAR > #{year} - 8 ) a ORDER BY EVAL_YEAR,ORG_CD ) GROUP BY ORG_CD ) a, ( SELECT SDIV_CD, DIV_NM FROM TZ_COMCODE WHERE LDIV_CD = 'G01' AND USE_YN='Y' ) b WHERE a.ORG_CD = b.SDIV_CD ORDER BY a.PADEP_NUM,a.ORG_CD
